objects.name: Create strategic plan
objects.description:
Strategic plans outline the mission, vision, and goals for an adversary at a high level in relation to the key partners, topics, and functions the adversary carries out. (Citation: KPMGChina5Year) (Citation: China5YearPlans) (Citation: ChinaUN)

Detectable by Common Defenses: No

Difficulty for the Adversary: Yes

external_references.description: KPMG. (2016, October 19). China’s 13th Five-Year Plan signals a potential new era of Sino-foreign cooperation, finds KPMG report. Retrieved March 2, 2017.
Wikipedia contributors. (2017, February 8). Five-year plans of China. Retrieved March 2, 2017.
People's Republic of China. (2015, November). China's 13th Five-Year Plan. Retrieved May 19, 2017.
